title: BRIEF-Italy's state lender had 4.262 pct in Telecom Italia on April 10 - filing
text:
April 11, 2018 / 4:47 PM / in 19 minutes BRIEF-Italy's state lender had 4.262 pct in Telecom Italia on April 10 - filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 11 (Reuters) - Telecom Italia: 
* State lender CDP had 4.262 percent of Telecom Italia as of April 10, according to a filing by Italyâ€™s market watchdog 
* Blackrock had voting rights equal to 2.058 percent, a potential stake Of 2.724 percent and other long positions of 0.195 percent in Telecom Italia as of April 9, the filing showed Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
